commit message: Now using maven. Changed some directory structures and added Robolectric test library.
Added coordinate to x,y point conversion. Uses custom jar file which is in own repository hosted in github.
Added some minucipalities and drawing them to the map view (still needs finishing)
Added location listener for user location and marker images to show user's location in the map view.
Added multi-selection list to choose desired municipalities.
Working version of the multi selection list preference (problems with separator escape)
Fixed Cancel button behaviour in the multi select list preference.
Fixed wrong x,y coordinate calculations when drawing locations.
Moved locationListener from MainApplication to AnimationActivity. Now stops listening location updates when animation activity is paused.
Readme, changelog etc. updates. Also disabled location updates when user preference for that is not selected.
Added Google play graphics and updated descriptions. Fixed one typo in strings.
